posts.post_title: F/S - T206 Mathewson (Dark Cap) and Downey (Carolina Brights)
posts.post_content:
*** DOWNEY IS SOLD  - MATTY SALE PENDING  *****

Thinking abouting parting ways with these two cards.  Make me an offer if interested.  No creasing or wrinkles on either card.  PM or email to [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url] .
